title: UK Fast
content:

Looking for just the 'UK Fast' Font please
author: MikeTaylor

comments.content: You could start with [Danube](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061249/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/danube-pro). Main difficulty would be to redraw /s.
